item.title: Kestra Install
item.description:
NMAP command to scan specific ports

Download the Docker Compose file

curl -o docker-compose.yml \
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kestra-io/kestra/develop/docker-compose.yml

Launch Kestra

Use the following command to start Kestra server:

docker-compose up -d

Open the URL http://localhost:8080 in your browser to launch the UI.

item.title: Scan Specific Network Ports with NMAP
item.description:
NMAP command to scan specific ports

The following NMAP command will scan ports 22, 80 and 443 on hosts in the 192.168.0.0/24 CIDR

nmap 192.168.0.0/24 -p 22,80,443

item.title: HKC Alarm Monitoring Solution
item.description:
The solution described involves using an OpenWrt-powered router connected to the printer serial port of an HKC alarm via a USB-to-serial adapter. The main script on the router parses messages from the alarm system, and if they meet certain criteria (deemed “interesting”), it forwards the message via SMS to a designated contact.

To ensure continuous operation, a cron job is set up to execute a keep-alive script, which verifies if the main script is running and starts it if it’s not. Additionally, the SMS gateway service provided by 46elks.com is utilized to send the SMS messages.
